summary: It's time for the final challenge of the Liar Game. Only Akiyama and Fukunaga had earned tickets to participate, but when Yokoya decides to drop out, Nao gets invited to join. Unwilling at ... See full summary »
cast: Erika Toda|Yoshiyoshi Arakawa|Seiichi Tanabe|Kazuma Suzuki|Megumi Seki|Shôta Matsuda|Michiko Kichise|Kento Nagayama|Mari Hamada|Sôkô Wada|Kôsuke Suzuki|Ikkei Watanabe|Yûki Matsumura|Shigeo Kiyama|Yuuki Akimoto
title: Raiâ gêmu: Za fainaru sutêji
